title: Украденная красота
overview: 20-year-old Elena, rushing to a date with handsome Igor, goes down into an underground passage and comes out 30 years older. Trying to understand what happened to her, Elena learns about a magic medallion that grants youth to its owner, taking it from others. Now the heroine will have to not only get her beauty back, but also understand that you have to fight for your happiness at any age.
